item.title: 1 in 5 people have this genetic risk factor for heart disease—and most have no idea because doctors rarely test for it
item.description: It's not only cholesterol that's worrisome: Elevated levels of lipoprotein(a) increase your risk of heart attack and stroke.

item.title: Gadi Amit, famed Fitbit designer, wants his peers to challenge the ‘money and tech folks’
item.description: At Fortune's Brainstorm Design, NewDealDesign founder Gadi Amit said he was "proud" of his early skepticism of design thinking.

item.title: Dollar Tree warns tariffs might force it to increase prices—and stop selling some products entirely
item.description: "We are prepared to act on multiple fronts,” said chief operating officer Mike Creedon.

item.title: DraftKings and FanDuel score a major win after the ballot measure to allow sportsbetting in Missouri barely scrapes by
item.description: The $43 million campaign—a record for a Missouri ballot measure—was funded almost entirely by the two companies.

item.title: ‘Targeted attack’ on UnitedHealthcare CEO ushers in a grim new era for executive safety fears
item.description: The health care business leader was gunned down yesterday in Manhattan.
